name: Star Shot
description:
Twin-stick shooter style game, but with the use of only 1 stick. You can move around with WASD or the Left analog stick, but you are constantly rotating and firing. SPACEBAR or most controller buttons to change the direction of rotation.

Intended for the GMTK Game Jam 2019, "Only One" theme.

Compatible with Keyboard and PS4 controller. (Xbox controller not tested)
